drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Talk: Taiwan's Green Parties, with Prof. Dafydd Fell

field_speakers.processed: Professor Dafydd Fell of SOAS University of London

field_description.processed:
Book Description:

Examining the Green Party Taiwan (GPT) since its establishment through the aftermath of the most recent national elections in January 2020, this book focuses on Taiwanâ€™s most important movement party over the last two and a half decades. Despite its limited electoral impact, its leaders have played a critical role in a range of social movements, including anti-nuclear and LGBT rights campaigns.
